problem_type: Student identifies equal vs unequal intervals (identify)
workspace_description: Three number lines (0-1) vertically stacked. First line: 3 equal intervals (thirds). Second line: 4 unequal intervals. Third line: 2 equal intervals.
prompt: Select the number line that shows thirds.
